short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Repeat your knowledge with flashcards on each new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension replaces a new tab in the browser. Each time you open the browser/new tab, you will see a new random card.

Features:

- No permissions
- No analytics
- No frameworks
- Multiple decks
- Support for different types of cards
- Local data storage
- Open-Source
